title: Executive Order 7602-Revocation of Executive Order No. 7261-A of December 31, 1935, Amending the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 1752 of the Revised Statutes (U.S.C. title 22, sec. 132), Executive Order No. 7261-A of December 31, 1935, amending the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7602-Revocation of Executive Order No. 7261-A of December 31, 1935, Amending the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers of the United States Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368948
